title: Welcome to Help and Support!  Now, how do I get some help with my issue?
body:
Hello!

This community is here to help you find the fastest way to get assistance with technical problems, get resources, and provide a location where players can discuss issues and help each other.  

***Before creating a new discussion, check to see if it exists already and upvote/comment in it! *** 

This is the best and fastest way to get your problem seen and to get help from a Wrenchmen or a Rioter!!!

Also, take a second to make a[ quick search on our Knowledge Base website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)!  Chances are we have an in-depth article with solutions to the issue that you are seeing!

Otherwise, if searching the Knowledge Base didn't work or if you don't see a discussion about your issue, please start with the list below for a quick guide on how to get your question answered so you can get back to the Fields of Justice.


**I am having:**

**Account Related Issues** *- Such as Bans, Account Theft, Rewards*

* **For the most part, account related issues need to be handled by Player Support**

  * [Submit a ticket via the Support Website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  The Support Team will be with you as soon as possible.

* **Bans**: For more info about bans related to leaving or idling, [see the LeaverBuster FAQ](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20030633-Leaving-Games-The-Leaver-Buster-FAQ). 

  * Your ban will be lifted at the same time as you were banned. (Banned at 11:00AM means ban lifted at 11:00AM)

  * If you want to know why you were banned or you have other questions/remarks regarding your ban, [submit a ticket via the Support Website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) - Please keep in mind that Riot will be unable to provide specifics of reports against your account.

**Purchase Issues**  *- Such as RP, Champion or Skin Purchases*

* **For the most part, purchase issues need to be handled through Player Support**.

  * For missing items or store error messages, [start with the Wrenchmen’s Toolbox Store Purchase Issues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sa8K7aTR-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-accountstore-issues-more)

  * If you’re getting an error with a Prepaid Riot Point Card take a look at the [Prepaid Card Thread](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=837699)
  * For all other purchase related issues, please make sure to [submit a ticket to support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

**Technical Issues** *- Such as Game Performance, Lag, Installation, Startup, Crashes*

* **[Start with the Wrenchmen's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues)**. Most of the technical issues can be solved with the tools found there.
  * Browse or search around for threads with similar issues.
  * If you still need help, create a new discussion in the Help & Support community with as much detail as possible.

**Other Issues**

* **Some issues are not intended for Help & Support.  If you want to:**

  * *Report someone* - [Submit a ticket via the Support Website](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Make sure that you attach any screenshots that you have.

  * *Report a bug* - Make a post it in the [Report a Bug Board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).


  * *Discuss an in-game feature or make a suggestion* - Post about it in the [Miscellaneous Board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).


** *Help & Support Wrenchmen* **

Wrenchmen are members of Riot's Volunteer Program.  They can help assist you with common technical problems and are recognized as community leaders by Riot Games.  Because they are not Riot staff members, Wrenchmen can't answer all questions, but they can help you find resources and show you how to get in contact with Player Support.

**Look for their special orange color and Wrench Icon!**

**Q: I want to help! How can I join the Wrenchmen?**

  We’re always on the lookout for potential Wrenchmen, but we do so with  the mentality that actions speak louder than words. If you’d like to  wear the badge of a Wrenchmen, show us that you can do it by continuing to help  answer the questions of your fellow summoners in a friendly and professional manner. We’ll be watching!

replies.body: My game froze so i quit and try to reconnect. It doesnt let me reconect. So i go on another account finish a game, go back to check my first account AND THE GAME IS STILL RUNNING. In that game, when i froze, everyone else in that game froze too.... So the game never finished..... HOW DO I GET MY ACCOUNT BACK RIOT PLEASE END THAT FREAKING GAME. I WANT TO USE MY ACCOUNT

I know this thread's a year old, and there probably hasn't been time to update this, but here goes anyway.

>Discuss an in-game feature or make a suggestion - Post about it in the Ideas & Feedback community: http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/ideas

Is the goal to advertise the old forums, or might this be better as a way to navigate within the Boards?

>Wrenchmen don't currently have special orange names or other distinguishing status on the Community Platform beta. We're still figuring out what that'll look like

;)

I bought the new yasuo skin but in game it's not working i made sure to click on the skin in champion select too but whenever i try to play it im put ingame with the original skin. I dont want this to be a waste of rp D:

:( LOL launcher keeps quitting "unexpectedly" and it's pissing me off. I play on a mac. Yes I know You can't game on macs but I'm trying to play with my boyfriend so please help :D :D :D thanks{{champion:150}}

Frost Archer and I have had the same problem as you. we have been trying to find a fix [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/na-support/AzIpc8XW-mac-client-wont-even-open?comment=00040000000000000000) come join the discussion, if you find a solution please tell us.
Found the problem! Riot no longer supports mac OS before 10.7 (read more [HERE](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=46513660))
I have a REEEAALLLY old mac that has been recently updated, I guess I'm done for? T___T
:/ Oh no.... so what happens now? :'(

Hello I just recently encountered a serious problem with my League file.
I play on a MacBook Pro running on OSX version 10.6.8 and just recently iv encountered a problem with the league launcher. The last iv successfully played the game was Tuesday (Aug 26th) and the only issue i had was when i got in game and opened up the item shop it would lag and then log me out of game. 
Now today I tried launching league and it wont even get past the launch icon. It'll try to load and then an error pops up saying "LoLLaunch quit unexpectedly" with the more details option okay option and Reopen option. Even if i click the Reopen it will try to open for about 30 seconds then the same failed to launch message pops up. 
I read on several other forum threads that just uninstalling and reinstalling work fine so i did that but it would still do the launch failed error. So i tried looking that up as well and encountered the UserKernal issue with the actual file being rather buggy. In those posts everyone is saying to use your original UserKernal file but i no longer have it. Now iv tried downloading league from the website 8 times now (each time id check the Kernal file to see if it was the corrupt one and if so completely wiping it from my computer) but even then its still failing to launch.
Im at a loss at what to really do at the moment any kind of help is really appreciated iv never had huge problems with my league before this.

So, Me and my friends were doing ranked 3's and the game ended we won and the Victory popped up and then we waited like 10 min for the stats and just went past them. When we looked at our match history the game was not there and our points were the same? We tried to leave and then log back in and now its saying we left a game and to reconnect.
Funny thing though the game doesn't exist?!???!!! Anyone else having this issue? I hope it doesn't cause us to lose that game and the points!
The ARAM champion select froze for everyone and i dont want to leave it because it counts as a dodge..We are all still sitting in it and its been 10 mins already..What do we do??

the past few games i have played all have been abruptly ended by me being disconnected and then not able to reconnect to the game, this is ben consistently happening ever seance the last patch and i would hope to know riot has a solit

i would like to know as to how big will this patch be...thank you in advance

about every week I get on my pc and then started up league of legends and it would restart and load all over again and it would stop at 99 and wouldn't load any more so I uninstall it an it takes like 2 hours to load back up then I can play again but then the next week I need to do it all over again any help please

I got banned for leaving games because I get disconnected by random computer restarts. I know I can play a full game, but these issues appear very randomly, like once a day. Even getting disconnected, my team sometimes still manages to win some games. I'm just asking for two things; one, if anyone else that experienced this issue can help me try to fix this problem, and can their being more leniency with games that a player has dc but still manages to win anyways.
I can log on just fine setup a game just fine but whenever i try to actually "accept" a game I disconnect from the server. any help?
Well this seems quicker. To keep a story short I want to know why I got sent back 3 ranks after season ended when I won 7 out of 10 of my placements. Bronze 1 (Season 3) -> Bronze 4 (Season 4)
Whenever i open the LoL client, theres this message called the maestro error and it tells me to restart. Ive done it several times and it still wont let me log in HELP!

Hi guys I used to have an account on the P.B.E, but since all the old account were shutdown I lost it. It's been a month since I've been trying to get it back. I've done a new application for it but i Kinda lost my old email that i used for my account here. I've just changed my email but I don't know if I had already received the message. I was wondering if its the case because today when I came on the site on went on the application page and for one split of a second I saw a page asking me to create my new P.B.E account but since then I have not been able to get there :S. So is there a way to know? 

Btw i really want to join back the P.B.E, I've been playing since 2009 and I love this game I want to be a part of it :) 

thanks for your time all, RIOT YOU GUYS ARE DOING A GREAT JOB :)

Tech Issue: League of Legends does not launch.
Whenever I click on the LoL launcher it jumps up and sits back down. It doesn't go to the orange play button like it usually does. I tried going into Activity Monitor and deleted the possible active UserKernel but that didn't work this time. I need a solution that doesn't result in having me re-downloading LoL again if possible. Thanks.

System Played On: Macbook Air

Shouldn't this and the Wrechman's Toolbox thread both be stickied at the top of the section?

You are absolutely correct!  Keep in mind that this new Forum is currently in its Beta phase.  Because of this, I am currently I am unable to sticky discussion topics to individual Communities.  If I sticky them here, they are stickied in the overall discussion board.  We are currently investigating ways to allow us to sticky discussion topics to individual communities!
